description:
Eager to end their battle, Zoro aims the awesome destructive power of his 108 Caliber Phoenix at the sinister Priest Ohm! Elsewhere, god demands that Robin help him search for a legendary golden bell.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hotobashiru Zangeki! Zoro VS Shinkan Ohm!!
Une lame jaillissante ! Zoro le pirate contre le prélat Om !
Zoro il pirata contro Ohm il sacerdote
Тянущийся меч! Зоро против жреца Ома!
เพลงดาบหลั่งไหล! โซโลV.S.เทพคุ้มกฎโอม!!
ほとばしる斬撃! ゾロvs神官オーム!!
